item.title: Want to know about me?
item.description: Do you want to expand your product assortment and want to use AI to solve it? Care about catering to all your customers and donâ€™t want to end up with a website full of out of stock products? You found a person who could solve that for you! I developed a solution for a major US fashion retailer to predict the quantity of a new product to stock and broaden the assortment slashing their overstocking costs by 60%.
